text: can install development version PEcAn.CLM45 r-universe like : can install directly GitHub remotes package like :
code: # Enable repository from pecanproject options(repos = c(   pecanproject = 'https://pecanproject.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org')) # Download and install PEcAn.CLM45 in R install.packages('PEcAn.CLM45') library(remotes) install_github('pecanproject/pecan',  subdir = "models/clm45")

title: met2model for CLM45 — met2model.CLM45
code: met2model.CLM45(   in.path,   in.prefix,   outfolder,   start_date,   end_date,   lst = 0,   lat,   lon,   ...,   overwrite = FALSE,   verbose = FALSE )

title: met2model for CLM45 — met2model.CLM45
text: .path location disk inputs stored .prefix prefix input output files outfolder location disk outputs stored start_date start date data downloaded (use year part date) end_date end date data downloaded (use year part date) lst timezone offset GMT hours lat, lon site coordinates ... arguments, currently ignored overwrite existing files overwritten verbose function verbosefor(year start_year:end_year)
